      • getBandCoords

        public Coordinates getBandCoords(int[] values,
                        double threshold,
                        java.lang.String orientation)

        BandCoords is used to calculate the sides of a possible plate location by having a clipping range between a chose peak

        Parameters:
        yValues - The vertical projection accumulate values produced from VertDataset
        threshold - The threshold value to determine where to find the Band's sides
        Returns:
        returns a Coordinate type with its X as Yb0 of a band and its Y as Yb1 of a band

      • zeroizeInterval

        public int[] zeroizeInterval(Coordinates coord,
                    int[] arr)
        Returns an img array with the given range of values set to 0
        Parameters:
        coord - coordinates of range for image to be set to 0
        arr - image array
        Returns:
        image array with the given range value zeroized.
